title: 銀魂オンシアター2D 一国傾城篇

search.title: Gintama on Theater 2D: Ikkoku Keisei-hen
search.original_title: 銀魂オンシアター2D 一国傾城篇
search.overview: A compilation film of the Courtesan of the Nation Arc, episodes 5–9 in the third season, featuring additional footage. The movie is a part of the "Gintama 20th Anniversary Project."
